name: Death Is A New Begining
description:
Story:

One day at Death Incorporated, Death_148576 found a note book let by the last soul.

In it Death_148576 found a lost memories. He then decide to become human by stole memories to soul that arrive at Death-Incorporated.

You can find different memories (red: anger, blue: sadness, green: disgust, purple: fear, yellow: hapiness) for each soul and you need to collect some of them.

Pay attention ! Don't bet too greedy or you will be punished by your manager !

Context:

This game was made during the Kindred Community Jam a 7 days game jam.

https://itch.io/jam/kindred-community-jam

We are a dev and an artist. It's our first game jam.

Liscense:

Fonts:

  • www.soixantedeux.co.nr => Venice Classique
